_comment: Patient Registry - Single Source of Truth for Patient Identity
_purpose: Maps patient ICNs (enterprise-wide identifiers) to site-specific DFNs for Vista RPC Broker simulation
_usage: Mock CDW: SQL insert scripts reference this for patient data
Vista RPC Broker: Resolves ICN → DFN per site before executing RPCs
Future MPI Service: Can expose this data via REST API
_customization_note: ✅ Customized with actual test patients from PostgreSQL (2025-12-15). Selected top 3 patients by clinical data richness for Vista RPC Broker simulation.
